chunks.lyrics: M O U R N I N G B E L O V E T H
A N G E R 'S S T E A M I N G A R R O W S
(/) - Legato Slide (Blank space indicates length of slide)
\ - Slide Down to/Down From (Blank space indicates length of slide)
/ - Slide Up To/Up From (Blank space indicates length of slide)
Bar x - The bar numbers for the current riff (not the overall song)
REST - Rest, and hold rest for duration of blank space
4t5 - Trill notes, and continue trill for duration of blank space
S.H - Semi Harmonic, indicated above tab. * symbol indicates note
Riff 1a: Guitar 1 with heavy distortion (Play 3 times)
On the last repeat, leave out the last bar and go straight into riff 2.
Riff 1b: Guitar 2 with heavy distortion (Play 3 times)
After the first repeat replace the first bar with the supplement:
As with riff 1a, leave out the last bar on the last repeat and go straight into
** This hammer-on extends over to riff 3 (When this riff is repeated later don't
Guitars 1 and 2 play riffs 2a and 2b respectively (Tempo = 60 BPM)
Allow the last bar to ring out.
